<script type="text/javascript">
function setCookie(name, value, days){
    var date = new Date();
	var expires = '';
	if (days != 0) {
		date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
	}
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + ";path=/";
}
function getParam(p){
	var match = RegExp('[?&]' + p + '=([^&]*)').exec(window.location.search);
	return match && decodeURIComponent(match[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
}
var gclid = getParam('gclid');
if(gclid){
    var gclsrc = getParam('gclsrc');
    if(!gclsrc || gclsrc.indexOf('aw') !== -1){
		setCookie('gclid', gclid, 90);
	}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function readCookie(name) {
	var n = name + "=";
	var cookie = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < cookie.length;i++) {
		var c = cookie[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' '){c = c.substring(1,c.length);}
		if (c.indexOf(n) == 0){return c.substring(n.length,c.length);}
	}
	return null;
}

// Timofey сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
var sourceFrom = getParam('from');
var sourceUtm = getParam('utm_source');
var campaignUtm = getParam('utm_campaign');
var termUtm = getParam('utm_term');
var mediumUtm = getParam('utm_medium');
var contentUtm = getParam('utm_content');
if(!sourceUtm && document.referrer) {
	var referrer = document.referrer.replace(/^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+).*$/im, '</body>');
	if (referrer != '' && referrer != 'mirror.vstroyka-solo.ru' && referrer != 'admmirror.vstroyka-solo.ru') {
		sourceUtm = referrer;
		campaignUtm = 'referrer';
		termUtm = '';
		mediumUtm = 'link';
		contentUtm = '';
	}
}
if(sourceFrom && !readCookie("from")) {
	setCookie('from', sourceFrom, 180);
}
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("utm_source")) {
	setCookie('utm_source', sourceUtm, 180);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 180);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("utm_term")) {
		setCookie('utm_term', termUtm, 180);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('utm_medium', mediumUtm, 180);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("utm_content")) {
		setCookie('utm_content', contentUtm, 180);
	}
}
// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
// Timofey сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_source")) {
	setCookie('last_utm_source', sourceUtm, 0);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 0);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_term")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_term', termUtm, 0);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_medium', mediumUtm, 0);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_content")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_content', contentUtm, 0);
	}
}
var leadGoodId = '0';
var leadCategoryId = '0';
var leadBrandId = '0';
var leadPageId = '0';
var leadRequestUri = window.location.href;
var leadReferrer = document.referrer;
if(!readCookie("leadFirstGoodId")) {
	// Берём из UTM меток, чтобы восстановить данные по старым клиентам
	var leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm = 1*readCookie("utm_term");
	setCookie('leadFirstGoodId', (leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm > 0 ? leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm : leadGoodId), 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastGoodId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastGoodId', leadGoodId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstBrandId', leadBrandId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastBrandId', leadBrandId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstPageId', leadPageId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastPageId', leadPageId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastReferrer")) {
	setCookie('leadLastReferrer', leadReferrer.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastRequestUri")) {
	setCookie('leadLastRequestUri', leadRequestUri.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}

// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018

			$(document).ready(function() {
				$('#featured .addAndReload').on('click touchend', function(event) {
					event.stopPropagation();
					event.preventDefault();
					element = $(this);
					$.ajax({
						type: 'GET',
						url: element.attr('href'),
						success: function(html) {
							location.reload(true);
						}
					});
					return false;
				});
			});
			</script>

				});

					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = 'https://mc.yandex.ru/metrika/watch.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {
						$(document).trigger('yametrika.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window, 'yandex_metrika_callbacks');

		   window.dataLayer.push({
				ecommerce: {
						add: {
						products: [{
							id: goodId,
							price: goodPrice,
							brand: goodBrand,
							category: goodCategory,
							quantity: goodQuantity
						}]
					}
				}
			});

			if (window.yaCounter17839486) {
				yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('yametrika.load', function() {
					yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('y.cart.add');
		});

		  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('order_done');
		  console.log('y.order.create');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('yametrika.load', function(){
				window.dataLayer.push({
					ecommerce: {
						purchase: {
							actionField: {
								id : orderId
							},
							products: orderProducts
						}
					}
				});
			  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formOrder');
			  console.log('y.order.save');
		  });
		});

		  console.log('y.message');

<script>
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w,d,r){w['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;w[r]=w[r]||function(){
			(w[r].q=w[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},w[r].l=1*new Date();

			var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
				s = d.createElement('script'),
				f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
			s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.async = true;
			s.src = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js';
			$(s).on('load', function() {
				try {
					$(document).trigger('ga.load');
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			});

			if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
				d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
			} else { f(); }

			})(window,document,'ga');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });

	  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){

		  ga('require', 'ec');
		  ga('send', 'pageview');

		  console.log('g.start');
	  });

			console.log('g.order.create');*/
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			/* Возможно лучше тут ga('ec:addProduct', {
			  'id': goodId,
			  'name': goodName,
			  'category': goodCategory,
			  'brand': goodBrand,
			  'price': goodPrice,
			  'quantity': goodQuantity
			});
			*/
			if (typeof ga == 'function') {
				ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('ga.load', function() {
					ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('g.cart.add');
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){

				window.google_conversion_id = 881262350;
				window.google_conversion_language = 'en';
				window.google_conversion_format = '3';
				window.google_conversion_color = 'ffffff';
				window.google_conversion_label = 'bOogCIOmhWkQjv6bpAM';
				window.google_conversion_value = orderTotal;
				window.google_conversion_currency = 'RUB';
				window.google_remarketing_only = false;

				var a = document.createElement('script');
				var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				a.async = 1;
				a.src = window.location.protocol + '//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion_async.js';
				m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);

				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					ga('ec:addProduct', {
					  'id': product.id,
					  'name': product.name,
					  'category': product.category,
					  'brand': product.brand,
					  'price': product.price,
					  'quantity': product.quantity
					});
				}

				ga('ec:setAction', 'purchase', {
				  'id': orderId,
				});

			  ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formOrder');
			  console.log('g.order.save');
		  });
	  });
	  $(document).on('callback.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formCallback');
		  console.log('g.callback');
	  });
	  $(document).on('reclamation.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formReclamation');
		  console.log('g.reclamation');
	  });
	  $(document).on('message.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formSendMessage');
		  console.log('g.message');
	  });
	</script>
<script>
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			setTimeout(function() {
				var products = '';
				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					products += (products?',':'') + product.id;
				}

				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&del='+products+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.del.'+products);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			setTimeout(function() {
				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&offer='+goodId+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.offer.'+goodId);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
	</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function (d, w) {
				var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = '//static.criteo.net/js/ld/ld.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {

						if ((window.location.pathname == '/') && (!window.location.search.match(/.*[\?&]p=.*/))) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewHome'});
							console.log('criteo.home');
						} else if (window.location.pathname.match(/.*\/categs\/.*/)) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewList', item: $('#listView .buy-button a').map(function(){return $(this).attr('href').replace(/^.*goodId=(\d+).*$/, '</body>');}).get()});
							console.log('criteo.list');
						}

						console.log('criteo.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window);
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
				{ event: 'viewItem', item: goodId});
			console.log('criteo.card');
		});
		$(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'viewBasket', item: [{id: goodId, price: goodPrice, quantity: goodQuantity}]});
			console.log('criteo.cart.add');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'trackTransaction', id: orderId, item: orderProducts});
			console.log('criteo.order.create');
		});
	</script>

<script>
		// интеграция roistat
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w, d, s, h, id) {
				w.roistatProjectId = id; w.roistatHost = h;
				var p = d.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://' : 'http://';
				var u = /^.*roistat_visit=[^;]+(.*)?$/.test(d.cookie) ? '/dist/module.js' : '/api/site/1.0/'+id+'/init';
				var js = d.createElement(s); js.charset='UTF-8'; js.async = 1; js.src = p+h+u; var js2 = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; js2.parentNode.insertBefore(js, js2);
			})(window, document, 'script', 'cloud.roistat.com', 'c3708d04433ae0e93ff9dde26dbfd1a1');

			// Обратный звонок
			$('#callbackFormDiv').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.open');
			});
			$('#callbackForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.send');
			});

			// Задать вопрос
			$('#callBackBtn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.open');
			});
			$('#callBackR form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.send');
			});

			// Запрос на возврат или обмен
			$('#reclamation form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_reclamation');
				console.log('roistat.reclamation.send');
			});

			// Свяжитесь с нами
			$('#contacts form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_contacts');
				console.log('roistat.contacts.send');
			});

			// Оформление заявки
			$('#firmForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_order');
				switch ($('#selPaymentType input[name=paymentType]:checked').val())
				{
					case '0': // Наличные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_cash');
						break;
					case '2': // Онлайн
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_online');
						break;
					case '1': // Безналичные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_company');
						break;
					case '5': // Рассрочка
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_partially');
						break;
				}
				console.log('roistat.order.create');
			});
			// Адрес из профиля Яндекса
			$('#firmForm form a.btn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('fill_profile_yandex');
				console.log('roistat.order.fillFromYandex');
			});
			// Детали заявки
			$('#orderDetails form').on('submit', function(){
				console.log('roistat.order.details');
			});

		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
function setCookie(name, value, days){
    var date = new Date();
	var expires = '';
	if (days != 0) {
		date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
	}
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + ";path=/";
}
function getParam(p){
	var match = RegExp('[?&]' + p + '=([^&]*)').exec(window.location.search);
	return match && decodeURIComponent(match[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
}
var gclid = getParam('gclid');
if(gclid){
    var gclsrc = getParam('gclsrc');
    if(!gclsrc || gclsrc.indexOf('aw') !== -1){
		setCookie('gclid', gclid, 90);
	}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function readCookie(name) {
	var n = name + "=";
	var cookie = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < cookie.length;i++) {
		var c = cookie[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' '){c = c.substring(1,c.length);}
		if (c.indexOf(n) == 0){return c.substring(n.length,c.length);}
	}
	return null;
}

// Timofey сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
var sourceFrom = getParam('from');
var sourceUtm = getParam('utm_source');
var campaignUtm = getParam('utm_campaign');
var termUtm = getParam('utm_term');
var mediumUtm = getParam('utm_medium');
var contentUtm = getParam('utm_content');
if(!sourceUtm && document.referrer) {
	var referrer = document.referrer.replace(/^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+).*$/im, '</body>');
	if (referrer != '' && referrer != 'mirror.vstroyka-solo.ru' && referrer != 'admmirror.vstroyka-solo.ru') {
		sourceUtm = referrer;
		campaignUtm = 'referrer';
		termUtm = '';
		mediumUtm = 'link';
		contentUtm = '';
	}
}
if(sourceFrom && !readCookie("from")) {
	setCookie('from', sourceFrom, 180);
}
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("utm_source")) {
	setCookie('utm_source', sourceUtm, 180);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 180);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("utm_term")) {
		setCookie('utm_term', termUtm, 180);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('utm_medium', mediumUtm, 180);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("utm_content")) {
		setCookie('utm_content', contentUtm, 180);
	}
}
// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
// Timofey сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_source")) {
	setCookie('last_utm_source', sourceUtm, 0);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 0);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_term")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_term', termUtm, 0);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_medium', mediumUtm, 0);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_content")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_content', contentUtm, 0);
	}
}
var leadGoodId = '0';
var leadCategoryId = '0';
var leadBrandId = '0';
var leadPageId = '0';
var leadRequestUri = window.location.href;
var leadReferrer = document.referrer;
if(!readCookie("leadFirstGoodId")) {
	// Берём из UTM меток, чтобы восстановить данные по старым клиентам
	var leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm = 1*readCookie("utm_term");
	setCookie('leadFirstGoodId', (leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm > 0 ? leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm : leadGoodId), 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastGoodId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastGoodId', leadGoodId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstBrandId', leadBrandId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastBrandId', leadBrandId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstPageId', leadPageId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastPageId', leadPageId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastReferrer")) {
	setCookie('leadLastReferrer', leadReferrer.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastRequestUri")) {
	setCookie('leadLastRequestUri', leadRequestUri.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}

// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018

</script>

					event.preventDefault();

						type: 'GET',

						}
					});
					return false;
				});

<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function (d, w, c) {
				(w[c] = w[c] || []).push(function() {
					try {
						w.yaCounter17839486 = new Ya.Metrika({
							id:17839486,
							clickmap:true,
							trackLinks:true,
							accurateTrackBounce:true,
							webvisor:true,
							ecommerce:'dataLayer'
						});
					} catch(e) { }
				});

				var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = 'https://mc.yandex.ru/metrika/watch.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {
						$(document).trigger('yametrika.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window, 'yandex_metrika_callbacks');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
		$(document).on('yametrika.load', function(){
		  console.log('y.start');
		});
		$(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
		   window.dataLayer.push({
				ecommerce: {
						add: {
						products: [{
							id: goodId,
							price: goodPrice,
							brand: goodBrand,
							category: goodCategory,
							quantity: goodQuantity
						}]
					}
				}
			});

			if (window.yaCounter17839486) {
				yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('yametrika.load', function() {
					yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('y.cart.add');
		});
		$(document).on('order.before.create', function(event, orderTotal){
		  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('order_done');
		  console.log('y.order.create');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('yametrika.load', function(){
				window.dataLayer.push({
					ecommerce: {
						purchase: {
							actionField: {
								id : orderId
							},
							products: orderProducts
						}
					}
				});
			  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formOrder');
			  console.log('y.order.save');
		  });
		});
		$(document).on('callback.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formCallBack');
		  console.log('y.callback');
		});
		$(document).on('reclamation.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formReclamation');
		  console.log('y.reclamation');
		});
		$(document).on('message.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formSendMessage');
		  console.log('y.message');
		});
		</script>
<script>
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w,d,r){w['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;w[r]=w[r]||function(){
			(w[r].q=w[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},w[r].l=1*new Date();

			var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
				s = d.createElement('script'),
				f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
			s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.async = true;
			s.src = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js';
			$(s).on('load', function() {
				try {
					$(document).trigger('ga.load');
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			});

			if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
				d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
			} else { f(); }

			})(window,document,'ga');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });

	  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){
		  ga('create', 'UA-61421459-1', 'auto');
		  ga('require', 'ec');
		  ga('send', 'pageview');

		  console.log('g.start');
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.before.create', function(event, orderTotal){
			/* Дубль конверсии order.after.create
			window.google_conversion_id = 881262350;
			window.google_conversion_label = 'bOogCIOmhWkQjv6bpAM';
			window.google_remarketing_only = false;
			window.google_conversion_currency = 'RUB';
			window.google_conversion_value = orderTotal;
			window.google_conversion_format = '3';

			var a = document.createElement('script');
			var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			a.async = 1;
			a.src = window.location.protocol + '//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion_async.js';
			m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);

			console.log('g.order.create');*/
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			/* Возможно лучше тут ga('ec:addProduct', {
			  'id': goodId,
			  'name': goodName,
			  'category': goodCategory,
			  'brand': goodBrand,
			  'price': goodPrice,
			  'quantity': goodQuantity
			});
			*/
			if (typeof ga == 'function') {
				ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('ga.load', function() {
					ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('g.cart.add');
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){

				window.google_conversion_id = 881262350;
				window.google_conversion_language = 'en';
				window.google_conversion_format = '3';
				window.google_conversion_color = 'ffffff';
				window.google_conversion_label = 'bOogCIOmhWkQjv6bpAM';
				window.google_conversion_value = orderTotal;
				window.google_conversion_currency = 'RUB';
				window.google_remarketing_only = false;

				var a = document.createElement('script');
				var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				a.async = 1;
				a.src = window.location.protocol + '//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion_async.js';
				m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);

				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					ga('ec:addProduct', {
					  'id': product.id,
					  'name': product.name,
					  'category': product.category,
					  'brand': product.brand,
					  'price': product.price,
					  'quantity': product.quantity
					});
				}

				ga('ec:setAction', 'purchase', {
				  'id': orderId,
				});

			  ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formOrder');
			  console.log('g.order.save');
		  });
	  });
	  $(document).on('callback.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formCallback');
		  console.log('g.callback');
	  });
	  $(document).on('reclamation.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formReclamation');
		  console.log('g.reclamation');
	  });
	  $(document).on('message.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formSendMessage');
		  console.log('g.message');
	  });
	</script>
<script>
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			setTimeout(function() {
				var products = '';
				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					products += (products?',':'') + product.id;
				}

				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&del='+products+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.del.'+products);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			setTimeout(function() {
				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&offer='+goodId+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.offer.'+goodId);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
	</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function (d, w) {
				var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = '//static.criteo.net/js/ld/ld.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {

						if ((window.location.pathname == '/') && (!window.location.search.match(/.*[\?&]p=.*/))) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewHome'});
							console.log('criteo.home');
						} else if (window.location.pathname.match(/.*\/categs\/.*/)) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewList', item: $('#listView .buy-button a').map(function(){return $(this).attr('href').replace(/^.*goodId=(\d+).*$/, '</body>');}).get()});
							console.log('criteo.list');
						}

						console.log('criteo.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window);
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
				{ event: 'viewItem', item: goodId});
			console.log('criteo.card');
		});
		$(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'viewBasket', item: [{id: goodId, price: goodPrice, quantity: goodQuantity}]});
			console.log('criteo.cart.add');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'trackTransaction', id: orderId, item: orderProducts});
			console.log('criteo.order.create');
		});
	</script>

<script>
		// интеграция roistat
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w, d, s, h, id) {
				w.roistatProjectId = id; w.roistatHost = h;
				var p = d.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://' : 'http://';
				var u = /^.*roistat_visit=[^;]+(.*)?$/.test(d.cookie) ? '/dist/module.js' : '/api/site/1.0/'+id+'/init';
				var js = d.createElement(s); js.charset='UTF-8'; js.async = 1; js.src = p+h+u; var js2 = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; js2.parentNode.insertBefore(js, js2);
			})(window, document, 'script', 'cloud.roistat.com', 'c3708d04433ae0e93ff9dde26dbfd1a1');

			// Обратный звонок
			$('#callbackFormDiv').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.open');
			});
			$('#callbackForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.send');
			});

			// Задать вопрос
			$('#callBackBtn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.open');
			});
			$('#callBackR form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.send');
			});

			// Запрос на возврат или обмен
			$('#reclamation form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_reclamation');
				console.log('roistat.reclamation.send');
			});

			// Свяжитесь с нами
			$('#contacts form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_contacts');
				console.log('roistat.contacts.send');
			});

			// Оформление заявки
			$('#firmForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_order');
				switch ($('#selPaymentType input[name=paymentType]:checked').val())
				{
					case '0': // Наличные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_cash');
						break;
					case '2': // Онлайн
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_online');
						break;
					case '1': // Безналичные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_company');
						break;
					case '5': // Рассрочка
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_partially');
						break;
				}
				console.log('roistat.order.create');
			});
			// Адрес из профиля Яндекса
			$('#firmForm form a.btn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('fill_profile_yandex');
				console.log('roistat.order.fillFromYandex');
			});
			// Детали заявки
			$('#orderDetails form').on('submit', function(){
				console.log('roistat.order.details');
			});

		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
	</script>

		</form>
		</div>
			</span>
			</li>

<script type="text/javascript">
function setCookie(name, value, days){
    var date = new Date();
	var expires = '';
	if (days != 0) {
		date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires=" + date.toGMTString();
	}
    document.cookie = name + "=" + value + expires + ";path=/";
}
function getParam(p){
	var match = RegExp('[?&]' + p + '=([^&]*)').exec(window.location.search);
	return match && decodeURIComponent(match[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
}
var gclid = getParam('gclid');
if(gclid){
    var gclsrc = getParam('gclsrc');
    if(!gclsrc || gclsrc.indexOf('aw') !== -1){
		setCookie('gclid', gclid, 90);
	}
}
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
function readCookie(name) {
	var n = name + "=";
	var cookie = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < cookie.length;i++) {
		var c = cookie[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' '){c = c.substring(1,c.length);}
		if (c.indexOf(n) == 0){return c.substring(n.length,c.length);}
	}
	return null;
}

// Timofey сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
var sourceFrom = getParam('from');
var sourceUtm = getParam('utm_source');
var campaignUtm = getParam('utm_campaign');
var termUtm = getParam('utm_term');
var mediumUtm = getParam('utm_medium');
var contentUtm = getParam('utm_content');
if(!sourceUtm && document.referrer) {
	var referrer = document.referrer.replace(/^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+).*$/im, '</body>');
	if (referrer != '' && referrer != 'mirror.vstroyka-solo.ru' && referrer != 'admmirror.vstroyka-solo.ru') {
		sourceUtm = referrer;
		campaignUtm = 'referrer';
		termUtm = '';
		mediumUtm = 'link';
		contentUtm = '';
	}
}
if(sourceFrom && !readCookie("from")) {
	setCookie('from', sourceFrom, 180);
}
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("utm_source")) {
	setCookie('utm_source', sourceUtm, 180);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 180);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("utm_term")) {
		setCookie('utm_term', termUtm, 180);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('utm_medium', mediumUtm, 180);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("utm_content")) {
		setCookie('utm_content', contentUtm, 180);
	}
}
// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе UTM меток 22.12.2017
// Timofey сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018
if(sourceUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_source")) {
	setCookie('last_utm_source', sourceUtm, 0);
	if(campaignUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_campaign")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_campaign', campaignUtm, 0);
	}
	if(termUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_term")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_term', termUtm, 0);
	}
	if(mediumUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_medium")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_medium', mediumUtm, 0);
	}
	if(contentUtm && !readCookie("last_utm_content")) {
		setCookie('last_utm_content', contentUtm, 0);
	}
}
var leadGoodId = '0';
var leadCategoryId = '0';
var leadBrandId = '0';
var leadPageId = '0';
var leadRequestUri = window.location.href;
var leadReferrer = document.referrer;
if(!readCookie("leadFirstGoodId")) {
	// Берём из UTM меток, чтобы восстановить данные по старым клиентам
	var leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm = 1*readCookie("utm_term");
	setCookie('leadFirstGoodId', (leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm > 0 ? leadFirstGoodIdFromUtm : leadGoodId), 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastGoodId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastGoodId', leadGoodId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastCategoryId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastCategoryId', leadCategoryId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstBrandId', leadBrandId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastBrandId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastBrandId', leadBrandId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadFirstPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadFirstPageId', leadPageId, 180);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastPageId")) {
	setCookie('leadLastPageId', leadPageId, 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastReferrer")) {
	setCookie('leadLastReferrer', leadReferrer.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}
if(!readCookie("leadLastRequestUri")) {
	setCookie('leadLastRequestUri', leadRequestUri.substring(0, 1000), 0);
}

// Timofey конец сохранение в заказе последних UTM меток 21.12.2018

</script>

<script>
			$(document).ready(function() {
				$('#featured .addAndReload').on('click touchend', function(event) {
					event.stopPropagation();
					event.preventDefault();
					element = $(this);
					$.ajax({
						type: 'GET',
						url: element.attr('href'),
						success: function(html) {
							location.reload(true);
						}
					});
					return false;
				});
			});
			</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function (d, w, c) {
				(w[c] = w[c] || []).push(function() {
					try {
						w.yaCounter17839486 = new Ya.Metrika({
							id:17839486,
							clickmap:true,
							trackLinks:true,
							accurateTrackBounce:true,
							webvisor:true,
							ecommerce:'dataLayer'
						});
					} catch(e) { }
				});

				var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = 'https://mc.yandex.ru/metrika/watch.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {
						$(document).trigger('yametrika.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window, 'yandex_metrika_callbacks');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
		$(document).on('yametrika.load', function(){
		  console.log('y.start');
		});
		$(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
		   window.dataLayer.push({
				ecommerce: {
						add: {
						products: [{
							id: goodId,
							price: goodPrice,
							brand: goodBrand,
							category: goodCategory,
							quantity: goodQuantity
						}]
					}
				}
			});

			if (window.yaCounter17839486) {
				yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('yametrika.load', function() {
					yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('y.cart.add');
		});
		$(document).on('order.before.create', function(event, orderTotal){
		  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('order_done');
		  console.log('y.order.create');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('yametrika.load', function(){
				window.dataLayer.push({
					ecommerce: {
						purchase: {
							actionField: {
								id : orderId
							},
							products: orderProducts
						}
					}
				});
			  yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formOrder');
			  console.log('y.order.save');
		  });
		});
		$(document).on('callback.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formCallBack');
		  console.log('y.callback');
		});
		$(document).on('reclamation.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formReclamation');
		  console.log('y.reclamation');
		});
		$(document).on('message.create', function(event){
			yaCounter17839486.reachGoal('formSendMessage');
		  console.log('y.message');
		});
		</script>
<script>
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w,d,r){w['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;w[r]=w[r]||function(){
			(w[r].q=w[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},w[r].l=1*new Date();

			var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
				s = d.createElement('script'),
				f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
			s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.async = true;
			s.src = 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js';
			$(s).on('load', function() {
				try {
					$(document).trigger('ga.load');
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			});

			if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
				d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
			} else { f(); }

			})(window,document,'ga');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });

	  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){
		  ga('create', 'UA-61421459-1', 'auto');
		  ga('require', 'ec');
		  ga('send', 'pageview');

		  console.log('g.start');
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.before.create', function(event, orderTotal){
			/* Дубль конверсии order.after.create
			window.google_conversion_id = 881262350;
			window.google_conversion_label = 'bOogCIOmhWkQjv6bpAM';
			window.google_remarketing_only = false;
			window.google_conversion_currency = 'RUB';
			window.google_conversion_value = orderTotal;
			window.google_conversion_format = '3';

			var a = document.createElement('script');
			var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			a.async = 1;
			a.src = window.location.protocol + '//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion_async.js';
			m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);

			console.log('g.order.create');*/
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			/* Возможно лучше тут ga('ec:addProduct', {
			  'id': goodId,
			  'name': goodName,
			  'category': goodCategory,
			  'brand': goodBrand,
			  'price': goodPrice,
			  'quantity': goodQuantity
			});
			*/
			if (typeof ga == 'function') {
				ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
			} else {
				// Бывает, что не успевает загрузиться счётчик.
				$(document).on('ga.load', function() {
					ga('send', 'event', 'buttons', 'clickAddToCart');
				});
			}
		  console.log('g.cart.add');
	  });
	  $(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
		  $(document).on('ga.load', function(){

				window.google_conversion_id = 881262350;
				window.google_conversion_language = 'en';
				window.google_conversion_format = '3';
				window.google_conversion_color = 'ffffff';
				window.google_conversion_label = 'bOogCIOmhWkQjv6bpAM';
				window.google_conversion_value = orderTotal;
				window.google_conversion_currency = 'RUB';
				window.google_remarketing_only = false;

				var a = document.createElement('script');
				var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				a.async = 1;
				a.src = window.location.protocol + '//www.googleadservices.com/pagead/conversion_async.js';
				m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);

				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					ga('ec:addProduct', {
					  'id': product.id,
					  'name': product.name,
					  'category': product.category,
					  'brand': product.brand,
					  'price': product.price,
					  'quantity': product.quantity
					});
				}

				ga('ec:setAction', 'purchase', {
				  'id': orderId,
				});

			  ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formOrder');
			  console.log('g.order.save');
		  });
	  });
	  $(document).on('callback.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formCallback');
		  console.log('g.callback');
	  });
	  $(document).on('reclamation.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formReclamation');
		  console.log('g.reclamation');
	  });
	  $(document).on('message.create', function(event){
			ga('send', 'event', 'forms', 'formSendMessage');
		  console.log('g.message');
	  });
	</script>
<script>
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			setTimeout(function() {
				var products = '';
				for (productIndex in orderProducts) {
					var product = orderProducts[productIndex];
					products += (products?',':'') + product.id;
				}

				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&del='+products+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.del.'+products);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			setTimeout(function() {
				try {
					var a = document.createElement('script');
					var m = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
					a.async = 1;
					a.src = window.location.protocol + '//recreativ.ru/trck.php?shop=3184&offer='+goodId+'&rnd='+Math.floor(Math.random()*999);
					m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m);
					console.log('recreativ.offer.'+goodId);
				} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
			}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		});
	</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function (d, w) {
				var n = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0],
					s = d.createElement('script'),
					f = function () { n.parentNode.insertBefore(s, n); };
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.src = '//static.criteo.net/js/ld/ld.js';
				$(s).on('load', function() {
					try {

						if ((window.location.pathname == '/') && (!window.location.search.match(/.*[\?&]p=.*/))) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewHome'});
							console.log('criteo.home');
						} else if (window.location.pathname.match(/.*\/categs\/.*/)) {
							window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
							var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
							window.criteo_q.push(
								{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
								{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
								{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
								{ event: 'viewList', item: $('#listView .buy-button a').map(function(){return $(this).attr('href').replace(/^.*goodId=(\d+).*$/, '</body>');}).get()});
							console.log('criteo.list');
						}

						console.log('criteo.load');
					} catch(e) { console.log(e);}
				});

				if (w.opera == '[object Opera]') {
					d.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', f, false);
				} else { f(); }
			})(document, window);
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
		$(document).on('goods.card.load', function(event, goodId) {
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
				{ event: 'viewItem', item: goodId});
			console.log('criteo.card');
		});
		$(document).on('order.cart.add', function(event, goodId, goodName, goodPrice, goodBrand, goodCategory, goodQuantity){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'viewBasket', item: [{id: goodId, price: goodPrice, quantity: goodQuantity}]});
			console.log('criteo.cart.add');
		});
		$(document).on('order.after.create', function(event, orderId, orderTotal, orderProducts){
			window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
			var deviceType = /iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 't' : /Mobile|iP(hone|od)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Silk/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? 'm' : 'd';
			window.criteo_q.push(
				{ event: 'setAccount', account: 57979},
				{ event: 'setEmail', email: '' },
				{ event: 'setSiteType', type: deviceType},
 				{ event: 'trackTransaction', id: orderId, item: orderProducts});
			console.log('criteo.order.create');
		});
	</script>

<script>
		// интеграция roistat
		$(document).ready(function() { setTimeout(function() {
			(function(w, d, s, h, id) {
				w.roistatProjectId = id; w.roistatHost = h;
				var p = d.location.protocol == 'https:' ? 'https://' : 'http://';
				var u = /^.*roistat_visit=[^;]+(.*)?$/.test(d.cookie) ? '/dist/module.js' : '/api/site/1.0/'+id+'/init';
				var js = d.createElement(s); js.charset='UTF-8'; js.async = 1; js.src = p+h+u; var js2 = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0]; js2.parentNode.insertBefore(js, js2);
			})(window, document, 'script', 'cloud.roistat.com', 'c3708d04433ae0e93ff9dde26dbfd1a1');

			// Обратный звонок
			$('#callbackFormDiv').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.open');
			});
			$('#callbackForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_callback');
				console.log('roistat.callback.send');
			});

			// Задать вопрос
			$('#callBackBtn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('want_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.open');
			});
			$('#callBackR form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_question');
				console.log('roistat.question.send');
			});

			// Запрос на возврат или обмен
			$('#reclamation form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_reclamation');
				console.log('roistat.reclamation.send');
			});

			// Свяжитесь с нами
			$('#contacts form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_contacts');
				console.log('roistat.contacts.send');
			});

			// Оформление заявки
			$('#firmForm form').on('submit', function(){
				roistat.event.send('submit_order');
				switch ($('#selPaymentType input[name=paymentType]:checked').val())
				{
					case '0': // Наличные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_cash');
						break;
					case '2': // Онлайн
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_online');
						break;
					case '1': // Безналичные
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_company');
						break;
					case '5': // Рассрочка
						roistat.event.send('submit_order_pay_partially');
						break;
				}
				console.log('roistat.order.create');
			});
			// Адрес из профиля Яндекса
			$('#firmForm form a.btn').on('click', function(){
				roistat.event.send('fill_profile_yandex');
				console.log('roistat.order.fillFromYandex');
			});
			// Детали заявки
			$('#orderDetails form').on('submit', function(){
				console.log('roistat.order.details');
			});

		}, deferredScriptsTimeout); });
	</script>

	$(document).ready(function() {

			$('#phone.fadeHide').removeClass('fadeHide');
		}, deferredScriptsTimeout);
		$('#nextPage').css('display','');	});
